mapper.insert: insert into config_vip_recharge (tid, vip_name, recharge_type, recharge_other_type, open_type, img_type, live_addr, url, qq, wechat, status, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, ys_id) values (#{tid}, #{vipName}, #{rechargeType}, #{rechargeOtherType}, #{openType}, #{imgType}, #{liveAddr}, #{url}, #{qq}, #{wechat}, #{status}, sysdate(), sysdate(), #{createBy}, #{createBy}, #{ysid})
mapper.select: select id, vip_name vipName, recharge_type rechargeType, recharge_other_type rechargeOtherType, open_type openType, img_type imgType, live_addr liveAddr, url, qq, wechat, status, update_time updateTime, ys_id ysid from config_vip_recharge where tid = #{tid}
mapper.insert: insert into config_online_recharge (tid, pay_id, pay_type, vip_list, other_name, is_diy, diy_min, diy_max, btn, pay_url, sort, channel_list, use_mobile, status, update_time, create_time, update_by, msg) values (#{tid}, #{payid}, #{payType}, #{vipList}, #{otherName}, #{isDiy}, #{diyMin}, #{diyMax}, #{btn}, #{payUrl}, #{sort}, #{channelList}, #{useMobile}, #{status}, sysdate(), sysdate(), #{updateBy}, #{msg})

insert into config_bank_recharge (tid, vip_list, open_type, btn, live_addr, bank_value, create_time, update_time, update_by, status) values (#{tid}, #{vipList}, #{openType}, #{btn}, #{liveAddr}, #{bankValue}, sysdate(), sysdate(), #{updateBy}, #{status})

insert into config_month_recharge (tid, jin_recharge, jin_recharge_give, jin_recharge_give_day, yin_recharge, yin_recharge_give, yin_recharge_give_day, open_type, live_addr, wechat, qq, create_time, update_time, update_by) values (#{tid}, #{jinRecharge}, #{jinRechargeGive}, #{jinRechargeGiveDay}, #{yinRecharge}, #{yinRechargeGive}, #{yinRechargeGiveDay}, #{openType}, #{liveAddr}, #{wechat}, #{qq}, sysdate(), sysdate(), #{updateBy})
mapper.select: select id, jin_recharge jinRecharge, jin_recharge_give jinRechargeGive, jin_recharge_give_day jinRechargeGiveDay, yin_recharge yinRecharge, yin_recharge_give yinRechargeGive, yin_recharge_give_day yinRechargeGiveDay, open_type openType, live_addr liveAddr, wechat, qq, create_time createTime, update_time updateTime, update_by updateBy from config_month_recharge where status = '1' and tid = #{tid}
mapper.insert: insert into config_ys(tid, username, password, google_check, google_key, update_time, create_time) values (#{tid}, #{username}, #{password}, #{googleCheck}, #{googleKey}, sysdate(), sysdate())
insert into config_ys_quota(ysid, username, value, amount, type, create_time) values (#{ysid}, #{username}, #{value}, #{amount}, #{type}, sysdate())
mapper.select:
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') day ,ysid ,username ysname ,COUNT(IF(TYPE=1,1,0)) transferInCounts ,SUM(IF(TYPE=1,VALUE,0))/10000 transferInAmount ,COUNT(IF(TYPE=2,1,0)) rechargeCounts ,SUM(IF(TYPE=2,VALUE,0))/10000 rechargeAmount ,(SELECT amount FROM config_ys_quota WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = day ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1) curr ,(SELECT SUM(ex_coins) FROM config_recharge_order WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = day AND admin_user_id = ysid) giveAmount ,(SELECT COUNT(ex_coins) FROM config_recharge_order WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = day AND admin_user_id = ysid) giveCount FROM config_ys_quota
and ysid = #{ysid} and ysname = #{ysname} and create_time >= #{beginTime} and #{endTime} >= create_time and ((type =1 and value/10000>=#{transferInMin}) or type = 2) and ((type =1 and #{transferInMin})>=value/10000 or type = 2) and ((type =2 and value/10000>=#{transferOutMin}) or type = 1) and ((type =2 and #{transferOutMax})>=value/10000 or type = 1)
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d'),ysid,username
